name: motivate
examples: Every day is a new opportunity.

normal: Every day is a new opportunity.
Success is not final; failure is not fatal.
wholesome: You've got this. One step at a time.
It's okay to take a breath. Then try again.
Progress over perfection. You're doing great.
toxic: Sleep is for the weak. Deploy at 2 AM.
If you're not stressed, you're not shipping.
Another day, another incident. Embrace it.
